mapper.select: select id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, apply_user_id, order_id, order_node_id, monitor_user_id, target_user_id, type, status from sys_order_apply where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_order_apply( id, create_date, create_user, delete_flag, remark, update_date, update_user, apply_user_id, order_id, order_node_id, monitor_user_id, target_user_id, type, status) values (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{deleteFlag}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser}, #{applyUserId}, #{orderId}, #{orderNodeId}, #{monitorUserId}, #{targetUserId}, #{type}, #{status})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_order_apply where delete_flag = 0
and ${item.name} ${item.symbol} #{item.data}
